head.supplied: Melbourne, botanic & zoologic Garden, ¶ 19.Aug 1861 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ In submitting to your favorable consideration a schedule of estimate of expenditure for the botanic Garden during the year 1862, I have t...

div.p: T61/6743, unit 749, VPRS 1189/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

In submitting to your favorable consideration a schedule of estimate of expenditure for the botanic Garden during the year 1862, I have the honor to point out, that the estimate of the zoological Gardens expenses will be early under -
should this be here?
the consideration of the Committee of the acclimatisation Society, but that the absence of Edward Wilson Esq., who is at present in New South Wales, is likely to cause a delay of a few days in the preparation of the estimate for the zoological Department.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: your most obedient and humble servant

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center; break-before: page;

div.p: Estimate of Expenditure in the Melbourne botanic Garden during the year 1862

cell.p: Wages to Gardeners, Labourers, Artisans, Carters, botanical Collectors, Messenger &c

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
cell.p: The wages-fund cannot well be diminished, if out of it all the smaller repairs in the establishment have to be defrayed as formerly was if it is desired, that public institutions should be supplied as extensively as before from this garden with plants and seeds. In the northern ground moreover will after the removal of part of the animals still considerable labour be required for keeping the ground in order and for continueing improvements, such as the formation of walks, drains, avenues; similar new arrangements are also yet necessary in the southern grounds

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Contingencies

cell.p: Purchase of plants and seeds

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;

padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
cell.p: This sum is intended for the purchase of seeds for lawns; also for the acquirement of plants and seeds from collectors or nurseries at home and abroad, whenever such are not obtainable by interchange.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Expenses for publishing works on Australian plants

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
cell.p: This sum would furnish illustrations in continuance of the publication of Dr Muellers work on Victorian plants, but it is also submitted to the consideration of the Government that a contribution of £100 might be made out of this vote to Mr G. Bentham, F.L.S., London, for whose universal flora of Australia, probably to be brought out under Dr Muellers aid, subsidies have been solicited by Sir Will. Hooker of Kew from all the Australian Governments.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Stores, timber, tools, herbarium-material, fencing materials, flower pots, labels &c &

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;

padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Forage for two draft horses and such quadrupedes, singing birds, water birds, fishes and other animals, as may be retained at the botanic Garden

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
cell.p:
It would not be possible to reduce this sum still further, since many of the animals and structures for their keeping cannot readily be removed and as it would also be a source of regreat
sic.
especially to the residents in the vicinity of the garden if the garden were entirely deprived of such animals, as are with little expense and care easily kept.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Transit expenses for plants, seeds &c and incidental expenses

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;

cell.p: Travelling expenses

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;

padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p:
Towards the enlargement of the collections in the botanical museum
MS marginal annotation by unknown: 'not to be included', and by Heales, 18 October 1861: 'altered and approved'.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.75pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: none; border-bottom: none;
cell.p: By a judicious purchase of prepared extra-Australian plants, for the acquisition of which this sum is solicited, our botanical museum would be rendered one of the most important of the globe and would furnish material for independent labours in any branch of descriptive Botany for which our botanical Office has already since several years past (as far as means permitted) been of service not only to this but also to the surrounding colonies.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

cell.p: Ferd. Mueller.
